liquipediamediawikimessages-desc: Globally overwrite message keys for all Liquipedia wikis
liquipediamediawikimessages-message-help: For example, this would be "Copyrightwarning" to change the text under the edit box.
liquipediamediawikimessages-value-helper: This would be the text you want to show up.
liquipediamediawikimessages-add-new-mess: Neither message name nor message value can be empty!
A message with this name already exists, use the edit function!
An unknown database error has occured trying to create this message!
liquipediamediawikimessages-edit-message: The message you want to edit does not exist!
The message has successfully been edited!
liquipediamediawikimessages-delete-messa: The message you want to delete does not exist!
Do you really want to delete this message? You will not be able to get it back!
apihelp-updatelpmwmessageapi-summary: API Helper to update LiquipediaMediaWikiMessages message values
liquipediamediawikimessages-api-error-mi: Missing parameter 'messagename'. It should be passed via POST
Missing parameter 'value'. It should be passed via POST
liquipediamediawikimessages-api-message-: Message name to update the value for
Value for the particular message defined before
liquipediamediawikimessages-api-result-e: No message with this message name found
updatelpmwmessageapi-action-notallowed: You are not allowed to update LiquipediaMediaWikiMessages
log-description-liquipediamediawikimessa: These events track when someone globally overwrite message keys for all Liquipedia wikis
